page.title: 12Cranshaws Wild Flowers
page.content:
The following species are found around Cranshaws in Spring and Summer:
WOODS: Wood Anemone, Moschatel, Garlic, Wood Sorrel, Woodruff, Willow Herb
MOORS: Rock Rose, Milkwort, Heath Pearlwort, Needle Whin, Cross-Leaved Heath, Heather, Bell Heather, Thyme, Bilberry, Heath Bedstraw
MARSHES: Marsh Marigold, Lady's Smock, Saxifrage, Early Purple Orchis, Mimulus, Duckweed, Pondweed, Spotted Orchis, Water Crowfoot, Common Rush, Cotton Grass, Water Mint, Water Cress, Brooklime, Ragged Robin, Louse Wort, Loosestrife, Yellow Rattle, Water Forget-me-not, Butterwort
